channel.title: collections on Pamperki
channel.description: Recent content in collections on Pamperki

item.title: Empire
item.description: My collection of miniatures for Warhammer Empire army. I’ve started to gather them in mid-school, over 15 years ago. I still hope to paint all of them at some point. Most of miniatures are produces by Games Workshop/Citadel. However I planning to add miniatures from other manufacturers in the future, that fit the ascetics of Empire.
